text: 3.18: Kis 16.7; 24.17; Ro 8.29; 1 Ko 13.12; 15.49; 1 T 1.11Nza zam bigɨna the nza ŋkoo vhagi fhuvara. Maaŋ muuŋgip, Guma Bakɨmen vhava ŋaara bakɨme nza shɨrigim, nza wari wo ŋkoo gari mɨniŋina fara muuŋgim, mba vhava ŋaar ana shɨgim, ana harigi gumgi ŋkoo ga vhekvhegi. Nza zazera mba vhava ŋaara ndim, mba vhava ŋaar nza muuŋgim, nza Guma Bakɨmera fara muuŋgi. Guma Bakɨme, ana Ŋina ma, ana maaŋ muuŋgiap mba tɨva mbui.
